item.title: iOS Crash 分析
item.description: What Crash Is APP被强制中断的行为视为Crash。数据上报中有完整的堆栈时我们可根据代码来分析出Crash原因，进行修正。当堆栈中出现了系统堆栈或

item.title: Image Preview
item.description:
Thanks for liwenyip/hugo-easy-gallery & Zebradil · Pull Request #48 .

Now, we could use {{< gallery >}} shortcode in hugo-theme-jane.

Normal Image

This is an image in static/image folder.

![This is an image in `static/image` folder.](/image/example.jpg)

item.title: Shortcodes Notice Preview
item.description: normal use Note example: {{% notice note %}} A notice disclaimer {{% /notice %}} Result: note A notice disclaimer You could custom title : {{% notice note 笔记 %}} A notice disclaimer {{% /notice %}} 笔记 A notice disclaimer tip {{% notice tip %}} A tip disclaimer {{% /tip %}} tip A tip disclaimer info {{% notice info %}} A info disclaimer {{% /notice %}} info An information

item.title: Jane-Theme Footnote Preview
item.description: Hugo-theme-jane optimized for footnote. When you mouse hover the footnote1 , footnote content will be displayed.
